segments.text: Hello ! So , you're back . Do you have everything with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We will need detailed information regarding the full name of the company , the company address ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , yes . I've got all of that here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And also , the bank and branch name the company holds an account with and the account number .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's the purpose for this check ? Would you like to know its repayment capacity ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that's one of the main things we are interested in . When do you think I can get hold of this report ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: As it's confidential there is a certain amount of red tape , but it shouldn't take too long . There is , of course a service fee of 300 RIB to be paid .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem , I'll settle that now . You can take it from my Business Account .
segments.speaker: S2
